comment: This is the closest we can get to ~ df-sbc if we start from ~ dfsbcq (see its comments) and ~ dfsbcq2 . (Contributed by NM, 18-Nov-2008.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 29-Jun-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
